name: Instagram MERN
desc: Built using MERN stack and realtime chat with the help of socket.iO. Introduce a cause profile feature where users can create and follow profiles dedicated to social causes participatig in events .

name: Chat App
desc: A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack, enabling users to connect, communicate, and share messages instantly.

name: Food Delivery
desc: An online food delivery platform built with the MERN stack, allowing users to browse, order, and track meals from local restaurants in real-time.

name: Ecommerce
desc: A simple e-commerce website built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js for product browsing, cart management, and order processing.
